        void replaceAttributes(java.util.HashMap<AvatarAttribute,AvatarAttribute> attributesMapping)
        Replaces attributes in this action according to the provided mapping.
        Parameters:
        attributesMapping - The mapping used to replace the attributes of the action. All the attributes of the block should be present as keys.
